title: The Largest Giant
html:
The Largest Giant

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
H the Largest Giant
Difficulty 31
Attacks Weapon 3d10
H the Largest Giant
Difficulty 31
Attacks

Weapon 3d10

Base level 26
Base experience 1103
Speed 12
Base AC 0
Base MR 15
Alignment -3 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) Unique
Genocidable No
Weight 2250
Nutritional value 750
Size Huge
Resistances fire, poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed fire (100%)

the Largest Giant:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is an overlord to its kind.
  • is a giant.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can throw boulders.
  • likes gems.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • hits creatures as a +3 weapon.
  • may turn against you when tame.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2644

The Largest Giant is a unique monster in SLASH'EM that appears on his special level. He hits harder than other giants and has a ton of hit points. His corpse conveys fire resistance, oddly enough, and he resists stoning.

Strategy

He's not a threat by the time you meet him, unless you have poor AC. In fact, the titans which frequently spawn on his level will likely be a greater concern.

As a pet

The Largest Giant can be useful as a pet: he is very strong, hits quite hard, and more importantly, naturally hits monsters as a +3 weapon. This last property is necessary to harm many monsters in SLASH'EM, although it is not enough to hurt Vecna or the strongest A. He is quite easy to tame, given his low MR. Be sure to have a renewable source of taming (spell, harp) if you do though: he has a chance of spontaneously turning traitor.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=The_Largest_Giant&oldid=89312"

The '''Largest Giant''' is a unique monster in [[SLASH'EM]] that appears on his [[Special level (SLASH'EM)#The Giant Caverns | special level]].  He hits harder than other giants and has a ton of hit points.  His corpse conveys [[fire resistance]], oddly enough, and he resists [[stoning]].

==Strategy==
He's not a threat by the time you meet him, unless you have poor [[AC]].  In fact, the [[titan]]s which frequently spawn on his level will likely be a greater concern.

===As a pet===
The Largest Giant can be useful as a pet: he is very strong, hits quite hard, and more importantly, naturally [[Need +x weapon to hit|hits monsters as a +3 weapon]].  This last property is necessary to harm many monsters in SLASH'EM, although it is not enough to hurt [[Vecna]] or the strongest {{white|A}}.  He is quite easy to tame, given his low MR.  Be sure to have a renewable source of taming ([[Spellbook of charm monster|spell]], [[Magic harp|harp]]) if you do though: he has a chance of spontaneously turning traitor.
